post:
Hello all!

We're back with a new product lineup FlexDedicated, dedicated resource VPS and we're launching in Los Angeles to start with! All plans are stackable (buy 2 and we will combine) and there is no restrictions or overselling on the line up :) the whole CPU, RAM & disk are yours to use. We've also restocked some dedicated servers.

Notice: FlexDedicated will be provisioned Monday 27th January.

<pre>
* CPU: 1 dedicated vCPU
* RAM: 4GB
* HDDD: 100GB 
* Bandwidth: 1Gbps 1TB
* Los Angeles, USA (more coming soon)
</pre>
[$5/month ](https://my.stockservers.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=221&currency=2)

To stack just order multiple and open a ticket after purchase.

Onto dedicated servers.

Be aware all servers are manually setup and it may take up to 3 business days, for these dedicated servers.

Additional Information
All services benefit from Quadranets 3Gbit VEST DDoS protection and benefit from their enterprise grade network. All dedicated servers are eligible for BGP sessions, as well as some eligible VPS VMs (contact us for more information) and bring your own IP.
